h1_38: Medical College of Wisconsin Affiliated Hospitals Program
h3_39: Medical College of Wisconsin Affiliated Hospitals, Inc
p_64: Dashes ("-") indicate data for a particular field are not provided for this program in Residency Explorer. Reasons why data are not being provided can vary (e.g., they are not reported or available, they are not applicable, or they are based on an insufficient number of people for reporting purposes).

p_100: The MCW dermatology residency values hardworking, scholarly, and enthusiastic residents who work well in a team environment. A one-paragraph supplemental application is optional.

p_344: The race/ethnicity data are shown alone or in combination with other race/ethnicity responses. Because some individuals may report multiple races/ethnicities, the totals may not equal 100%. Only residents who are U.S. citizens or permanent residents are included in race/ethnicity counts.
